name: The Chicken or the Egg
description:
YOUR COLONY OF SMALL ALIENS HAVE INVADED A CHICKEN COOP ON EARTH TO SETTLE THE UNIVERSAL DEBATE OF WHAT CAME FIRST, THE CHICKEN OR THE EGG?

COLLECT ALL 6 EGGS IN ORDER TO EVACUATE. HOWEVER, KEEP IN MIND, A CHICKENS TOUCH IS ENOUGH TO KILL.. AND THEY WILL PROTECT THEIR EGGS.
